summary: Built complete OMJ (Olimpiada Matematyczna Juniorów) handwritten solution validator web app. Features: preshared key authentication, hierarchical navigation (Year → Etap → Task), task content from 20 years of PDFs (100 tasks), photo upload for solutions, Claude CLI integration for scoring (0/2/5/6 points), submission history, Polish language throughout. Tech stack: FastAPI + Jinja2 + vanilla JS, file-based storage.
